sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './checkout.style.scss'; import {connect} from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { selectCartItems, selectCartTotal } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors'; const CheckoutPage =({cartItems, total}) =>(
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map(cartItem => cartItem.name) }
TOTAL: ${total}
); const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector ({ cartItems : selectCartItems, total : selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutPage);
